prompts: Create a dragon-type Pokemon with a long, elegant tail and soft, pastel colors.
I want a gentle-looking Pokemon that has a playful personality and is primarily purple.
Generate a cute, bipedal Pokemon with a whimsical design and bright green accents.
Make a Pokemon that loves to roam in lush environments, showcasing its slimy texture.
Imagine a dragon Pokemon that stands out with its unique features and friendly demeanor.
Design a Pokemon that embodies both strength and grace, with a soft purple palette.
Show me a Pokemon with a captivating appearance that thrives in forest habitats.
